channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @allilova @wmf Good, after what he did to our election, of course they didnâ€™t let him do more of the same.
What people want in a president. https://t.co/FKHg48ccM5
Welcome to the Age of Extinction. https://t.co/wRwfyMRiaZ
@wmf Maybe he should say something about what he did.
Jazz legend Louis Armstrong wore a Jewish Star necklace for most of his life. https://t.co/uPTN5kro3F

BTW, I might be missing something about Julian Assange. Isn't he the asshole who dumped all of HRC's emails and gave the NYT all the ammo they needed to tank her candidacy thus giving us Trump? I could be wrong, there could be two people named Julian Assange. I guess.
Texas Republican Convention calls Biden illegitimate and rebukes Cornyn. https://t.co/b2S3fLJIgM
@paull_evan that's kind of embarrassing, but amazing for someone who's about to turn 80.

The people who say our democracy is teetering on the edge are a few seasons behind. It's time to design a political party that fits the political system we have. If I said the things we have to do to get back on track, you'd cancel me hard. But we still have to do them. ;-)
Lady Madonna. https://t.co/NeJZQr5wnQ
Paul McCartney Best Songs According To 80 Musicians. https://t.co/EJ4lVxDcv0
Red Line Through HTTPS. https://t.co/G4Qs6bTvds

Every day on average I write one or two things on my blog that would probably get me fired if I had a job. ðŸ˜€
But I don't think it should be that way. People abuse their power to get other people fired. And that chills creative thought. Listening to an idea you don't like is good for your creativity.
Today I learned that when you fly a fair number of your fellow travelers are infected with Covid.
@nakedjen Itâ€™s all bullshit.
This father has photographed his son all his life. He hopes to change the world's view of Black families. https://t.co/Tr1vyGtPAJ
@jeffjarvis hard to say. i was a bit off for about 24 hours then back to normal. all of our systems are different, i generally don't have bad reactions to vaccines.
@rebeccawb yes, i got them all at the same time. it was a bit of a shock to the system, but that lasted about 24 hours and i was back to normal.
Biden falls off bike during Rehoboth Beach ride, says 'Iâ€™m good.' https://t.co/U30tfM4kV9

A Covid theory... My friend visiting from out of town had Covid. We were together 3 full days. I didn't get Covid. Why? I got my second booster less than a month ago. At the same time I got pneumonia and shingles vaccines. The theory: My immune system was standing by.

The next part of the reallysimple project is a mailbox style reader that plugs in like a LEGO block. You want a different kind of reader? It'll be easy to plug it in too. Here's an idea what my demo plugin looks like. https://t.co/jT5uTDbj8e
the goal of the reallysimple project is to have lots of devs doing lots of experimentation with RSS at the same time, and having all their work be totally compatible.
to start a new developer process that avoids the pitfalls of the RSS environment of the last 20 years.
If you have any questions, let me know.
@dietsociety that is exactly what journalism says. perfect. on the other hand we have big problems that will either kill us or get solved.

This sounds like what I've been saying about journalism forever. They write their consensus. They totally favor people who can help them, either by promoting or hiring. The powerful ones like where they are and don't want change. https://t.co/uJ3n3EC04D
But it is possible to get around journalism.
It has happened over and over since the web started.
And it's going to keep happening. My hope is that one of the times around the loop, the stranglehold journalism has on us will break. And then things can change.
@TaylorLorenz That's journalism Taylor. I tried to say that when we talked, but you tried to talk me out of it.

If DeSantis is the Repub nominee in 2024, I expect they will not have to resort to insurrection to win the White House. People will be tired of Biden and the wimpy Dems, and will want a fresh face, even if he is a white supremacist. https://t.co/n2EnBgbZDH
